sentences.en: a car bearing diplomatic license plates
sentences.cn: 挂外交牌照的车

sentences.en: a mother bear and her cubs
sentences.cn: 母熊和它的熊崽们

sentences.en: As the plants grow and start to bear fruit they will need a lot of water.
sentences.cn: 随着植物的生长及开始结果，它们将需要大量的水分。

sentences.en: Black people continue to bear the brunt of most racial violence (=  have to deal with the most difficult or damaging part  ) .
sentences.cn: 在大多数种族暴力事件中，黑人仍然是首当其冲的受害群体。

sentences.en: bringing his rifle to bear on a distant target.
sentences.cn: 用他的步枪瞄准远处的目标。

sentences.en: British scientists have brought computer science to bear on this problem.
sentences.cn: 英国的科学家们已经应用计算机科学来解决这个问题。

sentences.en: Bruce graduated to chef at the Bear Hotel.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯晋升为大熊饭店的厨师长。

sentences.en: Eleanor's work among the women will, I trust, bear fruit.
sentences.cn: 我相信埃莉诺所做的工作会在妇女中有所成效。

sentences.en: Experts were worried the financial system would not be able to bear the strain .
sentences.cn: 专家担心现行金融体系承受不了这样的压力。

sentences.en: Fares have gone up, perhaps to more than the market will bear.
sentences.cn: 票价上涨了，而且可能超出了市场的承受能力。

sentences.en: Go left onto the A107 and bear left into Seven Sisters Road.
sentences.cn: 向左驶入A107号公路，然后左转进七姐妹路。

sentences.en: He can't bear to talk about it, even to me.
sentences.cn: 他不想和别人谈论这件事，哪怕对我也是一样。

sentences.en: He could not bear to be seen to act dishonourably.
sentences.cn: 他不能容忍被人发现行为失检。

sentences.en: He didn't bear anyone any ill will.
sentences.cn: 他对任何人都无恶意。

sentences.en: He had been mauled by a bear.
sentences.cn: 他被熊袭击过。

sentences.en: I can't bear having to think what I'm going to say.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意考虑将要说什么话。

sentences.en: I can't bear people who make judgements and label me.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌人们对我品头论足。

sentences.en: I couldn't bear to see my reflection in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 我不忍看镜子里自己的样子。

sentences.en: If you'll bear with me, Frank, just let me try to explain.
sentences.cn: 你要对我有点儿耐心，弗兰克，让我跟你解释。

sentences.en: little is left to bear witness to the past greatness of the city.
sentences.cn: 这个城市没留下什么能证明它过去的辉煌。

sentences.en: Make the water as hot as you can bear .
sentences.cn: 把水温调到你能忍受的最高温度。

sentences.en: Overcrowding makes prison life even harder to bear.
sentences.cn: 过度拥挤使监狱生活更加难以忍受。

sentences.en: Passengers could be insulting, and stewardesses just had to grin and bear it (=  accept it without complaining  ) .
sentences.cn: 乘客有时会破口大骂，而乘务员只能微笑着默默忍受。

sentences.en: She could not bear the relentless music and turned down the volume.
sentences.cn: 她受不了没完没了的音乐，就把音量调小了。

sentences.en: she had reservations about how much influence she could bring to bear.
sentences.cn: 在自己能运用多大的影响力这方面，她有所保留。

sentences.en: She was afraid she wouldn’t be able to bear the pain.
sentences.cn: 她恐怕自己忍受不了这种痛苦。

sentences.en: The bear exposed its teeth in a muffled growl.
sentences.cn: 那只熊龇出牙齿，发出一声低沉的吼叫。

sentences.en: The eight-year bond will bear annual interest of 10.5%.
sentences.cn: 这种8年期的债券年利率为10.5%。

sentences.en: the folly of her action was borne in on her.
sentences.cn: 她认识到自己行为的愚蠢了。

sentences.en: The humiliation was more than he could bear .
sentences.cn: 这样的羞辱是他万万不能忍受的。

sentences.en: The labels bear a yellow and black symbol.
sentences.cn: 标签上有一个黄黑两色的标记。

sentences.en: The letter bore no signature.
sentences.cn: 这封信上没有署名。

sentences.en: the map didn't seem to bear any relation to the roads.
sentences.cn: 这地图似乎和道路丝毫不一致。

sentences.en: The store bears the hallmarks (=  it has the qualities  ) of a family-owned business.
sentences.cn: 这个商店有家族企业的特色。

sentences.en: The town still bears the scars of the bombings during the war.
sentences.cn: 城里依然可见战时轰炸留下的疮痍。

sentences.en: their tactics bear the stamp of Soviet military training.
sentences.cn: 他们的战术带有苏联军事训练的印记。

words.tran_cn: 粗暴的；如熊的；股票看跌的
持票人；[建] 承木；[机] 托架；送信人；搬运工人

phrases.tran_cn: 佩戴盾形徽号；展示盾形纹章
熊市；空头市场；卖空市场
对…施加压力；与…有关；对…有影响；瞄准
贝尔斯登（美国投资银行）
可怕得难以想像；不堪想像

trans.tran_cn: 熊，棘手的事，（在证券市场等）看跌的人
trans.tran_en: a large strong animal with thick fur, that eats flesh, fruit, and insects

trans.tran_cn: 忍受，承受，承担责任，心怀（感情），显示，带有，拥有，携带，举止，生育，结果，转向，传送
trans.tran_en: if a tree bears fruit, it produces fruit
to bravely accept or deal with a painful, difficult, or upsetting situation

trans.tran_cn: 生育；承担；运输；怀有，心怀；写有
trans.tran_en: to be responsible for or accept something
